words.source: H994 bi, interjection of entreaty; KJV 'O', ESV 'Oh', NASB 'Please' — DIVERGENT: translations vary in rendering this particle of entreaty
H136 ʾAdonay, noun ms + 1cs suffix; KJV 'my Lord', ESV 'my Lord', NASB 'Lord'
H7971 shalach, Qal imperative ms; KJV 'send', ESV 'send', NASB 'send'
H4994 naʾ, particle of entreaty; KJV 'I pray thee', ESV 'please' (implied), NASB 'please' (implied)

H3027 yad, noun fs + preposition be; KJV 'by the hand of', ESV 'by the hand of' (implied), NASB 'by' (implied) — DIVERGENT: ESV 'someone else', NASB 'whomever You will'; KJV 'him whom thou wilt send' — idiomatic, lit. 'by the hand [of whomever] you will send'

H7971 shalach, Qal yiqtol 2ms; KJV 'thou wilt send', ESV 'someone else', NASB 'whomever You will' — DIVERGENT: ESV paraphrases freely; the Hebrew is literally 'send by the hand of [whomever] you will send'
